Room.Name: East Uland Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling on the old carriage road for the Uland Mansion.
Room.LongDescription: One of the most notorious pirates that ever sailed the Respitial Sea built his mansion on the bluffs overlooking the sea he loved. Or so the stories say. No living sober person has ever found the place. However, there are plenty of tales of its existance back in the pubs and bars along Rum Road.
